title: safar1980
author: safar1980
content: Blogger says that thanks to this device, he mined about 150 Siacoins per day, which brought him 4650 Siacoins in 30 days. If you convert this amount into dollars, you get a revenue of $ 50 per month. At the same time, 33% of these incomes went to pay bills for electricity, which in his area costs about 10 cents per kilowatt-hour.After all deductions, Wax's earnings were about $27.50 per month, which meant that after 12 months he would have made a profit of about $ 402, and after 24 months â€” $ 804, which fully recouped the cost of the device.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tCKEHt9nKeMhttps://happycoin.club/kriptobloger-protestiroval-dohodnost-majnera-siacoin-za-600/https://www.ebay.com/itm/374059295733?
